MASEventService.Name: SubscriptionsEvents
MASEventService.Description: The Subscription service provides all the methods for clients to display, add, update, and delete subscriptions for accounts.

EventMethod.Name: StartSubscriptions
EventMethod.Description: Method to initiate the process of subscribing an account to a service

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

Parameter.Name: AccountIdentifier
Parameter.Description: This is an instance of the AccountIdentifier class. This class allows clients to specify either the integer account identifier from the database or the username/namespace of the account. The service can then resolve this information to an account identifier that it can use.

EventMethod.Name: GetSubscriptionsList
EventMethod.Description: Method to fetch a list of subecriptions to an account

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

Parameter.Name: SubscriptionsList
Parameter.Description: Parameter representing a list of subscriptions

EventMethod.Name: Subscribe
EventMethod.Description: Method to subscribe an account to a subscription

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

EventMethod.Name: GetPOList
EventMethod.Description: Method to fetch a product offering list

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

Parameter.Name: POList
Parameter.Description: Parameter represtnting a product offering list

Parameter.Name: POEffectiveDate
Parameter.Description: Parameter identifying the timeframe for which a PO list is effective

EventMethod.Name: SubscribeToPO
EventMethod.Description: Method to subsrcibe an accout to a specific product offering

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

Parameter.Name: ProductOfferingId
Parameter.Description: Parameter identifying a specific product offering

EventMethod.Name: OKSetSubscriptionDate
EventMethod.Description: Method to verify the setting of a subscription date

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

Parameter.Name: SubscriptionInstance
Parameter.Description: Parameter representing a subscription instance

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

Parameter.Name: SubscriptionId
Parameter.Description: Reference parameter identifying a subsctiption

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

Parameter.Name: SubscriptionId
Parameter.Description: Reference parameter identifying a subsctiption

EventMethod.Name: OKDeleteSubscription
EventMethod.Description: Method to verify the deletion of a subscription

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

Parameter.Name: SubscriptionId
Parameter.Description: Reference parameter identifying a subsctiption

EventMethod.Name: Unsubscribe
EventMethod.Description: Method to unsibscribe an account from a subscription

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

Parameter.Name: SubscriptionId
Parameter.Description: Reference parameter identifying a subsctiption

EventMethod.Name: OKUnsubscribeSubscription
EventMethod.Description: Method to verify the unsubscription of an account

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

Parameter.Name: SubscriptionInstance
Parameter.Description: Parameter representing a subscription instance

EventMethod.Name: Rates
EventMethod.Description: Method to control the rates of a subscription

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

Parameter.Name: SubscriptionId
Parameter.Description: Reference parameter identifying a subsctiption

EventMethod.Name: CancelManageSubscriptions
EventMethod.Description: Method to cancel a subscription management action

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

EventMethod.Name: OKSetUDRCValues
EventMethod.Description: Method to verify the setting of UDRC values

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

Parameter.Name: SubscriptionInstance
Parameter.Description: Parameter representing a subscription instance

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account
